plot: Petty crime police brigade (B.D.), vacationing on the Black Sea Riviera, gets involved in a drug trafficking and religious artifact smuggling operation while three paroled inept convicts dream up get-rich-quick schemes.
title: B.D. la munte si la mare
plot_es: Petty crime police brigade (B.D.), vacationing on the Black Sea Riviera, gets involved in a drug trafficking and religious artifact smuggling operation while three paroled inept convicts dream up get-rich-quick schemes.
